001package ca.gc.cra.radar.config;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
004import java.util.Set;
005
006/**
007 * Immutable runtime configuration shared across RADAR CLIs.
008 *
009 * @param interfaceName network interface used for capture defaults
010 * @param bpf default Berkeley Packet Filter expression; empty string to disable
011 * @param snapLength default snap length for packet capture
012 * @param enabledProtocols protocols enabled by default for reconstruction
013 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
014 */
015public record Config(
016    String interfaceName,
017    String bpf,
018    int snapLength,
019    Set<ProtocolId> enabledProtocols) {
020  /**
021   * Provides default configuration values used when no external config is supplied.
022   *
023   * @return default configuration
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  public static Config defaults() {
027    return new Config("eth0", "", 65535, Set.of(ProtocolId.HTTP, ProtocolId.TN3270));
028  }
029}
